name: Space Assault (TendoRonin)
description:
In Space Assault, players take on the role of a lone spaceship pilot defending their home planet from an alien invasion. The game is set in a 2D pixelated world reminiscent of classic arcade games like Space Invaders.

Players must navigate their ship left and right across the screen, avoiding enemies while blasting away at incoming alien ships. As the game progresses, the enemies become more numerous , requiring quick reflexes and expert aim to survive.

Pixel Defender features intuitive controls and colorful, retro-style graphics that will appeal to fans of classic arcade games. With multiple levels of increasing difficulty and endless gameplay, Pixel Defender is sure to provide hours of entertainment for casual and hardcore gamers alike.

ControlsMovementLeft/Right Arrow Keys
FireRCTRL
